entry.title: fix: generator type
entry.summary: fix: generator type update: output as rss2 use pnpm fix: pnpm not use cache
entry.content:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
------ package-lock.json
------ package.json
"compile": "pnpm exec babel src --out-dir dist", "release": "pnpm exec ncc build ./dist/main.js -o release -m ", "build": "pnpm compile && pnpm release", "jsdoc": "pnpx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.config.json", "test": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=\"--experimental-vm-modules\" pnpx jest", "lint": "pnpx eslint src/**.js --fix", "format": "pnpx prettier src/**.js --write" "src/*.js": "ppnpx eslint --fix", "**.js*": "ppnpx prettier --write"

entry.title: merge: merge develop branch to release
entry.summary: merge: merge develop branch to release
entry.content:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
- name: Upload Feeds (by Commit) run: | git config --global user.email "actions@github.com" git config --global user.name "Actions User" git add rss/feeds.xml git commit -m "Update RSS Feed" git push ------ .gitignore
# RSS Feed # rss/* ------ README.md
[RSS Feed for Develeop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/atsushifx/commit2feed/develop/rss/feeds.xml)

entry.title: Merge remote-tracking branch 'refs/remotes/origin/develop' into develop
entry.content:
rss/feeds.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"> <id>https://api.github.com/repos/atsushifx/commit2feed/commits/latest</id> <title>atsushifx / commit2feed</title> <updated>2024-05-28T07:38:19.000Z</updated> <generator>htttps://github.com/atsushifx/commit2feed</generator> <author> <name>atsushifx</name> <uri>https://github.com/atsushifx</uri> </author> <link rel="alternate" href="https://api.github.com/repos/atsushifx/commit2feed/commits/latest"/> <subtitle>Latest 10 commits for atsushifx / commit2feed</subtitle>

entry.title: fix; gitignore allow rss feed to commit
entry.summary: fix; gitignore allow rss feed to commit

entry.title: update: use git to push rss feeds to github repository
entry.summary: update: use git to push rss feeds to github repository
entry.content:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
- name: Upload Feeds (by Commit) run: | git config --global user.email "actions@github.com" git config --global user.name "Actions User" git add rss/feeds.xml git commit -m "Update RSS Feed" git push

entry.title: merge: merge development to release test
entry.summary: merge: merge development to release test
entry.content:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
with: ref: develop with: node-version: '20' cache: 'npm' uses: atsushifx/commit2feed@develop ------ package-lock.json
------ package.json
"compile": "npm exec babel src --out-dir dist", "release": "npx ncc build ./dist/main.js -o release -m ", "build": "npm run compile && npm run release", "jsdoc": "npx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.config.json", "test": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=\"--experimental-vm-modules\" npx jest", "lint": "npx eslint src/**.js --fix", "format": "npx prettier src/**.js --write" "dependencies": { "@actions/core": "^1.10.1", "feed": "^4.2.2" },

entry.title: update: package.jsonをnpm対応に
entry.content:
.github/workflows/generate_rss.yml
with: ref: develop with: node-version: '20' cache: 'npm' uses: atsushifx/commit2feed@develop ------ package-lock.json
------ package.json
"compile": "npm exec babel src --out-dir dist", "release": "npx ncc build ./dist/main.js -o release -m ", "build": "npm run compile && npm run release", "jsdoc": "npx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.config.json", "test": "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=\"--experimental-vm-modules\" npx jest", "lint": "npx eslint src/**.js --fix", "format": "npx prettier src/**.js --write" "dependencies": { "@actions/core": "^1.10.1", "feed": "^4.2.2" },
